body:
How to get a girlfriend. Step 1, find a random girl that you like. Step 2, give her a gram of kindness. Step 3, when she wants to thank you somehow, ask if she can be your girlfriend
 CRITICAL PART!!! Make sure you say "Just kidding!" immediately. Step 4, congratulations you lost your virginity.
I'll just pretend part 2 doesn't exist
first one is the "cheating" tag done right.
Esto estuvo muy bueno y hasta tuvo vanilla y todo
masterpiece
Its my birthday
Author really makes the best quality ones.... But I'd like his usual rough ones tho
It's too vanillafor me
I would like the same level in all the stories...
This is really amazing !
Why is there a my little ponie tag?

So in conclusion, while quality RL porn exists, its rarely worth it for me. I only go to RL porn sites a couple times a year when im really in the mood for a real life woman. The women in hentai are better, the sites for hentai are better, the quality of the porn within said sites is better, and <if it matters to you> the plot <real plot, not "plot"> is better as well. There are just so many reasons for someone like me to prefer relatively vanilla hentai over RL porn. Yeah the kinkier stuff is good too, and I like both. But to say the only reason to go to hentai vs real life porn IS the weird stuff is ignorant.

@mandragoora part 2: more than that, real life porn sites fucking suck. the ratio of quality porn to shitty porn is ridiculous. so many are either ridiculously short or ridiculously long (both tend to have shitty pacing either way). any schmuck with a camera and a kinky girlfriend can upload a shitty video.

And the NAMES of the videos are often misleading. searching for particular tags is also hard as fuck because of how many show up that are irrelevant.

The girls in hentai are also exaggerated and idealized. find a woman even approaching the figures of some of the females in hentai and they just don't look as attractive (to me). 

more on looks, this is weird to say and i might be wording it wrong but...I like my hentai women to act like cheap whores, not LOOK like cheap whores. I don't like seeing the makeup for example. While realistically women in hentai wear makeup, you tend to not notice outside lipstick because it just looks like part of their face and not a caked on mess.

@mandragoora because real porn sucks. not because its "normal" but because It feels fake and phoned in. I can't get my head around it being an actual teacher or cheating wife, or whatever and not a porn star pretnding to be those things. Even if its fiction, a doujin at elast creates another world where these women ARE these things. I don't have to put up with shitty acting and shitty pacing

Also we can get better/different/unique angles during sex that we can't get in real porn.

Also, I admit it. i'm a fucking loser nerd who prefers anime waifu's over real life.

I don't need it to be "weird", not that i'm against it. But to say that hentai should ONLY be weird because otherwise "why not just watch real porn" is viewing it with your own narrow lens of the medium.
FANTASTIC!
this is one of me favorite so far

@Bullitt Maybe it's because doujin autors knows that hentai is made for the unusual stuff that normal porn can't provide, quite nonsensical to do a hentai like porn we normally find in pornhub and stuff, of course they've similar version of NTR but it's fake af, everything different they try to make feels fake, look at the japanese porn version of hentai tentacles, it's so pathetic beyong words, hentai doesn't feel fake. In another words if you really enjoy doujin like that why don't you simply watch Xvideos? You sincerely think that a cartoon is more enjoyable than a motion picture real life action? Why? (i'm not trying to jugding you ater all i read/watch hentai for the bizarre stuff, i just don't get it, it's like a hamburger maniac who prefers supermarket burgers over Burger King)
I only read for the first story, love me some juicy milfs, it's rare to find ones that have good art without also being ntr.
Wasn't the 2nd one NTR? But all the stories were very good :I
i love the first story. is it oneshot like that?
The fucking cencorment always ruined it.

@ Angry Tentacles  I totally agree with you I feel like they should continue Inran Elf  Upton at least 2 volumes but still it's kinda disappointing as there's been no update or how many more it's got great potential for all sorts of stuff lol let's say a snake, tentacle eel monster, Egglaying, Merman, The daughters marriage to whichever creature, etc,etc. If it does continues for more than 2 volumes I BET it's gonna be included in the History Of HENTAI !

@AngryTentacles 100% agree with you, i'm a huge fan of Kazuhiro not just because of his masterpiece art but his bizarre plots aswell. I personally despise "normal" doujin.

this is a good read but not a good fap mat cause it's not that hot as Inran Elf(the mother-daughter elves) or more specifically the Inran Elf Haha to Roper doujin but still this is a good read, shame a lot of good fap doujins are still in JYen while few are in USDollar... so much unfairness that China gets to read it first damn... why did i forgot to read Chinese again FUUUUCCCCKKKK!!!!!!!!!
